content.about: Heritage Valuations Providence provides professional antique appraisal services in the Providence area with expertise in antique furniture, collectibles, fine art, and estate items. We offer thorough, accurate valuations for insurance, estate planning, charitable donations, and more.

reviews.author: Linda M.
reviews.content: I needed an appraisal for a charitable donation of my antique collection, and they delivered excellent service. All tax requirements were met perfectly.

reviews.content: Very responsive and easy to work with. Heritage Valuations Providence's expertise with my antique pocket watch collection was impressive.
